item.chrysalis.heal.desc: Sets the player's health to the max value when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.fill_hunger.desc: Sets the player's hunger bar to the max value when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.teleport_to_spawnpoint.de: Teleports the player to their spawnpoint when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.kill_wand.desc: Instantly kills any entity that is hit with the Kill Wand
item.chrysalis.heal_message: Set player health to max health
item.chrysalis.fill_hunger_message: Set player hunger to max food value
gamerule.passiveGriefing: Allow non-destructive world interactions from mobs
gamerule.dragonGriefing: Allow for Ender Dragons to destroy blocks
gamerule.witherGriefing: Allow for Withers to destroy blocks
gamerule.explosionItemDecay: In explosions, most items will be destroyed
gamerule.explosionItemDecay.description: Most items caught in explosions are lost in the explosion.
